item.title: Mindfulness: A deeper approach to navigating organizational change
item.description:
Mindfulness: A deeper approach to navigating organizational change

Being in the field of organizational change management for the past 15+ years, my team and I have been brought into some of the toughest business/change scenarios out there.

item.title: Mantras For Finding Happiness
item.description:
Mantras For Finding Happiness

Feeling stressed? You're not alone. We all have a center of wisdom and balance within us, but sometimes life takes over and we can feel all over the place! We all need a course-correcting tool -- A "GPS for the Soul" -- to help us find our way back to center.
